content.text:
Arr, ye be askin' about them eight-armed sea beasties! 

Octopuses be found in all the seven seas, me hearty! From the shallow coastal waters to the deep briny depths. These crafty creatures make their homes in every ocean around the globe, favoring rocky bottoms, coral reefs, and seafloor dens.

Unlike us seafarin' folk, they prefer the warmer tropical waters, but some hardy varieties brave the colder seas too! They be hidin' in caves and crevices, usin' their flexible bodies to squeeze into the tiniest hidey-holes that would make even the slimmest pirate jealous!

Would ye be wantin' to know more about these mysterious tentacled treasures of the deep? Yarrr! 🦑🏴‍☠️
